belongs_to_collection.name: Rodney Dangerfield: The Ultimate No Respect Collection

original_title: Rodney Dangerfield: It's Not Easy Bein' Me
overview: Rodney Dangerfield hosted this HBO special which includes fantastic performances by some of the best new talent of 1986. Comedians include Jeff Altman, Roseanne Barr, Sam Kinison, Bob Nelson, Jerry Seinfeld, Robert Townsend, and, of course, Rodney Dangerfield.
title: Rodney Dangerfield: It's Not Easy Bein' Me
